titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> April 6th = "Picene"? <*> June 17 = "Saur"? <*> Oct 24 = "Helles"? s2: <*> May 13 = "Dejoice"? <*> note at bottom = "back"? s3: <*> May 8 = "Wride"? s4: <*> Jan 23 = note after title, or part of title? unclear s7: <*> Mar 10 = "Mouts"? s8: <*> note at bottom = "waith"?
